channel.title: Book Notes on Joshua Graves
channel.description: Recent content in Book Notes on Joshua Graves

item.title: CPTSD, From Surviving to Thriving
item.description: Focuses on inner child work, reparenting, and facing your shadow as ways to recover from CPTSD. By Pete Walker.

item.title: Designing Your Life
item.description: Using Design Thinking to create a more meaningful life. By Bill Burnett and Dave Evans.

item.title: Nonviolent Communication, A Language of Life
item.description: On compassionate communication and tools for resolving conflict, fostering empathy, and building authentic relationships. By Dr. Marshall Rosenberg.

item.title: The Four Agreements
item.description: Four principles for living an authentic life. By Don Miguel Ruiz.

item.title: What It Takes to Heal
item.description: Somatics and therapeutic practices can help heal from personal and generational trauma. By Prentis Hemphill.
